items.sentence: I can lend you an umbrella if you don't have one.
Let's order the most expensive thing on the menu.
We might go to Australia next month to visit Tom.
I think that Tom and Mary were talking in French.
I think that Tom doesn't speak French very often.
I thought that you said that you didn't know Tom.
I thought that you said that you didn't like Tom.
I thought that you said that you worked with Tom.
I thought that we were just going to talk to Tom.
Tom thought Mary didn't know how to speak French.
